survey_brief: This survey aims to understand employee preferences and satisfaction with sustainable office supplies to enhance workplace sustainability initiatives.

questions.question_text: How important is it for you to have sustainable office supplies (e.g., recycled paper, refillable pens) in your workplace?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for clarity. Ensure the question is mobile-friendly.

script.question_text: How important is it for you to have sustainable office supplies (e.g., recycled paper, refillable pens) in your workplace?
script.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.

questions.question_text: Which of the following sustainable office supplies do you currently use? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.
